name: Purple Dragon
description: Purple Dragon is not your average indica. This cross between Purple Urkle and Blue Dragon is more stimulating than other indicas, providing users with a cerebral and energizing experience upon first taste. While initially uplifting, Purple Dragon shows its full range of effects over time. Relaxing muscles and relieving pain, this strain provides a gentle and effective body buzz. Purple Dragonâ€™s unique effects are complemented by its smooth aroma. Like other purples, this strain features a musky scent and floral taste. Purple Dragon is a must-try strain for those looking for a truly different cannabis experience
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Uplifted, Happy, Giggly, Stress, Insomnia, Depression, Pain, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Anxious
